text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The PlayChoice-10 is an arcade system that was developed and manufactured by Nintendo. The system can play up to 10 different Nintendo Entertainment System games - the games are in the form of circuit boards which can be plugged into one of ten open slots on the PlayChoice-10's motherboard.
